item.title: CANVA Video Editor for Youtube SHORTS (Hollywood Niche) - Upwork
item.description:
Need a long term CANVA video editor who is knowledgeable about hollywood stars like taylor swift, kardashians, selena gomez, etc Bonuses and raises included over time. $160 is per month for 20 shorts/week (30 seconds each) for $2 payment.

I have a very specific, extremely simple process in making the shorts because I do them myself but I no longer have time. They are super quick and easy using a built in template in canva. You just need to be knowledgeable about the hollywood space specifically the high following stars like the ones mentioned above. This is the most important requirement since the process is very simple and can be easily taught.

Budget: $160

item.title: Video Creation for Social Media Marketing - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video creator to produce a captivating video for our company, Deal & Runner. The video will serve as a promotional tool to be posted on social media platforms. Your primary goal will be to effectively market our brand and showcase our services in an engaging way. The ideal candidate should possess a creative mindset and be able to craft a compelling video that resonates with our target audience. Key skills required for this project include:

- Content Creation
- Video editing
- Storyboarding
- Graphic design
- Animation
- Strong understanding of social media platforms
- Ability to meet deadlines and work collaboratively with our marketing team.

If you are passionate about creating visually stunning videos and have a proven track record in social media marketing, we would love to hear from you.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:59 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Video editor - Upwork
item.description:
$100/mo

Editing for short form content

20 edited videos for $100

This editing is VERY simple, but you must understand English. The job is making videos for an acting class. Actors perform a scene two times. You will take small parts of each take and put them next to each other to compare them. The job is simple, but you must understand English and basic editing.

You will be making before and after videos for an acting class. I will show you examples after applying.

Pro: you are interested in acting, film, or directing

This is a consistent job with opportunity to grow. Please start your Upwork application with the word BLUE so I know you read this job description and can speak English.

Budget: $100

item.title: I am looking for a very high quality video editor for my YouTube channel in the billionaire niche - Upwork
item.description:
Hey!

I am looking for a professional to create / edit one YouTube video about 'Stupidly Expensive Things Mr Beast Owns'.

The length of the video should be between 8-10 minutes long and pay $40 dollar per video.


I will provide the script and voice over. (You will not have to do any research regarding the video topic for the video, you will have to find clips/photos/background music/etc to create the video).

I am looking for someone who:

- Has experience/work in creating social media video content, especially YouTube videos.
- Has experience using video editing softwares such as Adobe Premiere Pro
- Fluent in English
- Able to work within the deadline (24 hours)
- The style should adhere to our brand guidelines.

However, you can be very creative to make the video entertaining and engaging.

If you have read the middle of this job description, please type your favorite animal at the beginning or end of your proposal.

Video examples:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i9wGbkpqG7E&t=14s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yPolPyk1T_Q



Also, if you’ve ever made a youtube cashcow video in the millionaire / luxury niche, please attach samples of your work.


I look forward to hopefully working with you!


Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing Project - Upwork
item.description:
I have a two minute brand video I would like cut into shorter versions for the purpose of advertising with super imposed text added. The edits will be highly engaging and inspiring particularly at the start of the video to get attention.

Deliverables:
- approx. 15 second edit [vertical - 9:16]
- approx. 15 second [horizontal - 16:9]
- approx. 30 second edit [vertical - 9:16]
- approx. 30 second [horizontal - 16:9]

Super-imposed text to include:
- Secluded rehabilitation haven
- Specialised trauma and addiction treatment
- Evidence-based biopsychosocial therapies
- Community and connection-focused care
- Nature-immersed and informed recovery

Call to Action (super-imposed text)
- Healing is Within Reach... Reach out today

Deadline:
- 1 week from contract acceptance

Open to a slightly higher budget if previous work is of an exceptionally high quality.

Budget: $150

item.title: Video Editor for Sports YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor!
Job details:

Niche: Sports
Number of videos: Around 1-2 Per Week.
Length of videos: Around 7-12 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video (No Later Than 48 Hours)
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)

Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and are starting a new one in the sports niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially):

• WHAT IF • CRAZY SPORTS STORIES/FACTS
The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use)
Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the type of videos we are looking for: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qy7ZtlcGeEg&t=5s and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X7lQQaliWjQ

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.

You also need to be a resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.

Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with Example: "Banana Milkshake", so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Documentary, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Documentary, Adobe After Effects
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: Videographer and Social Media Content Specialist for Agtech Testimonial Campaign - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented Videographer and Social Media Content Specialist to produce our "Customer Testimonial Series".
This role involves creating compelling testimonial videos from our early adopters, editing and optimizing these videos for various social media platforms, and assisting in driving brand awareness and engagement. The ideal candidate is passionate about storytelling, has a keen eye for detail, and understands the nuances of social media content.

Key Responsibilities:
*Collaborate with Farm Fayre’s marketing team to plan and execute a series of testimonial videos.
*Film and produce high-quality video content, capturing the essence of Farm Fayre’s impact on early adopters.
*Edit and optimize video content for various social media platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, Snapchat, and LinkedIn.
*Create short video snippets, teasers, and highlights to maximize engagement and sharing.
*Assist in developing a cohesive visual and storytelling style that aligns with Farm Fayre’s brand values and tone.
*Provide creative input and suggest improvements to video content to enhance viewer engagement.

Qualifications:
*Proven experience as a videographer and video editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
*Proficiency in video editing software.
*Experience creating content for social media platforms and understanding of best practices for each.
*Excellent storytelling skills and ability to convey messages effectively through video.
*Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently.
*Knowledge of the agricultural sector or willingness to learn about it is a plus.
*Availability to travel within Ireland for on-site filming.

How to Apply:

Please submit your proposal via Upwork, including:
*Your resume/CV.
*A link to your portfolio showcasing relevant work.
*A brief cover letter explaining why you’re the ideal candidate for this role.
*Your availability and expected rate for this project.

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:41 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:People, Business, Drone Videography, Lifestyle, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography
Skills: People, Business, Drone Videography, Lifestyle, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography
Country: Ireland
click to apply

*Create short video snippets, teasers, and highlights to maximize engagement and sharing.
*Assist in developing a cohesive visual and storytelling style that aligns with Farm Fayre’s brand values and tone.
*Provide creative input and suggest improvements to video content to enhance viewer engagement.

Qualifications:
*Proven experience as a videographer and video editor, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
*Proficiency in video editing software.
*Experience creating content for social media platforms and understanding of best practices for each.
*Excellent storytelling skills and ability to convey messages effectively through video.
*Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently.
*Knowledge of the agricultural sector or willingness to learn about it is a plus.
*Availability to travel within Ireland for on-site filming.

How to Apply:

Please submit your proposal via Upwork, including:
*Your resume/CV.
*A link to your portfolio showcasing relevant work.
*A brief cover letter explaining why you’re the ideal candidate for this role.
*Your availability and expected rate for this project.

Budget: $1,500

item.title: Video Testimonial Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Video Testimonial Creator to help us produce short video testimonials for use on various social media platforms using the platform Canva.com. The videos need to be in square and reel formats and created using specific exiting canva templates. The ability to work quickly and efficiently is a must. Attention to detail and fluent English skills are also important.

Here are examples of the finished video: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1MSc5uNU0gdRxtHyINk9EfkGbhX1UkS9f?usp=sharing

You will create testimonial videos based on the examples and the templates provided.

I will provide:
- Name of person giving the testimonial (need to put on every slide)
- Profile image of the person giving testimonial (need to put on every slide)
- Text for the different slides; note the first slide serves as a “thumbnail”
- Audio file with the spoken testimonial
- Outro to keep at end of the testimonial (is already inside the canva template)

Your task is to put it all together in canva and adjust the timing of each slide so it syncs up with the audio.

I offer to pay $2 per video testimonial (square and reel). So this would be $16 for 8 videos (square and reel) I need for now.  Does that work for you?

If we work well together, I have more work like this on an ongoing basis. (Need to create ~3-4 video testimonials per month). Also, you could take over other parts of the testimonial video making process, like creating the AI audio files and choosing the text for the video testimonials (needs good English skills)

If you take on more tasks in the video testimonial creating process I would pay you more.

If you have the skills and expertise we are looking for, we would love to hear from you!

Please mention the word 'canva' in the beginning of your proposal to show that you have read through this entire job post and understood the task.

Thanks,
Nathan



Budget: $16
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:31 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Canva, English
Skills: Testimonial Video, Canva, English
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Recap Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Hello talented social media video editors!

We are Secured Capital Lending, a nationwide private lender, and we are seeking a skilled social media video editor to create a recap video for the recent NLE (National Lending Experts) Conference in Los Angeles.

Our CEO, Sam Chivitchian, spoke at the NLE Leadership Forum, and we had an engaging booth that facilitated numerous connections with new and old business friends.

Project Details:

- Video Format: REEL, 9:16 aspect ratio
- Length: The recap video should be around 1 to 2 minutes long
- Style: Follow the style of our previous recap videos
- Content: About 2 hours of raw video footage and a little over 100 photos from the conference will be provided
- Platforms: LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, YT Shorts, and TikTok

What We Provide:

- Google Drive links to all raw video clips and photos
- Links to previous recap videos for reference:
+ Recap Video Captivate Conference 2023
+ Recap Video of National Lending Experts Conference 2023
+ Recap Video of Sponsoring Innovate Conference 2023

Requirements:

- Experience with editing recap videos or similar content for social media
- Ability to follow a specific editing style
- Proficiency in creating engaging and professional REEL videos
- Familiarity with video requirements and best practices for LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok

If you have the skills and creativity to bring our conference highlights to life, please apply with your portfolio showcasing similar work. This can turn into a long term gig! We make a lot of social media content!

Looking forward to seeing your talent!

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Video Enhancement, Instagram Reels, Audio Editing, Corporate Video, Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Advertising
Skills: Social Video Enhancement, Instagram Reels, Audio Editing, Corporate Video, Social Media Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Social Media Advertising
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: Content Creator for Rap Artist - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Content Creator to edit and produce engaging content for a rap artist. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of the rap music genre, and be able to create visually appealing and high-quality content. Responsibilities include editing audio tracks, creating music videos, managing social media accounts, and developing promotional materials. The successful candidate should have a creative mindset, excellent video editing skills, and a passion for rap music. It is essential to have experience with industry-standard software such as Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects. If you are a talented Content Creator with a passion for rap music, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 20:18 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Audio Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Content Writing
Skills: Audio Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Content Writing
Country: United States

item.title: Long-Term Project YouTube 2-D animation and video editing - Upwork
item.description:
Experienced YouTube team wants to get Video Editor and 2-D animator in the style of the following channels:
https://www.youtube.com/@ThePaintExplainer
https://www.youtube.com/@TheEvaluat0r

Specific Video Inspiration: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kW6uIYcbniA&t=317s

Looking to make 10 minute (8-12 minute range) videos on a weekly basis for long term commitment.  Need high quality work and YouTube experience preferred.

Please reply back with:
1) Examples of your work
2) What you would charge?
3) Your estimate of how long it would take for such a video to go from voice over to production with your team?

We are excited add a dynamic partner for this new direction.
